graph_title: Dynamics of changes in water use efficiency by economic activity
indicator_name: Change in water-use efficiency over time
indicator_name_national: Dynamics of changes in water use efficiency by economic activity
source_compilation_1: Committee on Statistics of the Ministry of National Economy of the Republic of Kazakhstan Ministry of Ecology, Geology and Natural Resources of the Republic of Kazakhstan (RSE Kazhydromet, Committee on Water Management)
source_data_1: The calculation is based on a 2-TP (water management), formed by the Committee on Water Management  Ministry of Ecology, Geology and Natural Resources of the Republic of Kazakhstan
source_implementation_1: Ministry of Ecology, Geology and Natural Resources of the Republic of Kazakhstan
target: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity
